tags.name: include
tags.description: Imports a FrontSail component by a name specified in the `component` attribute value of this element.

attributes.name: component
attributes.description: Full name of the component to include.

tags.name: inject
tags.description: Fills its contents into a specific `<outlet>` named as the `into` attribute value of this element.

attributes.name: into
attributes.description: An outlet name where the content should be injected.

tags.name: markdown
tags.description: Allows use of Markdown syntax, which is parsed into HTML during the build process.

tags.name: outlet
tags.description: A placeholder that FrontSail dynamically fills with content from an `<include>` element.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: A unique name for the outlet (defaults to `main`).
